name: Hall of Mirrors
longDesc: The Hall of Mirrors is a dark building with  many gables and gargoyles along the roof edges. Vines flow down the walls. On the West side lies an entrance. The South side has a cellar door. Windows are along the East and North sides of the building.
shortDesc: The Hall of Mirrors is vine-covered. There is an entrance on the west side, a cellar door on the South side, windows on East and North sides.
